title: Integrated Theory and Practice Instructional Design to Leverage Cognitive Learning Potential in Physical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: A course for language education practitioners to learn how to apply cognitive learning strategies from physical education to language instruction

learning_goals: Explain at least three instructional design models that integrate theory and practice to promote cognitive learning in physical education.
Analyze the impact of learning motivation types and academic self-concept on cognitive learning and apply findings to practical settings.
Complete a project designing instructional activities that integrate theory and practice in a mobile microlearning environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
